contents.text: Welcome to Snowflake Computing, the Peninsula’s only cloud data warehouse for all your data and all your users.
To talk to our Sales department and learn about our cloud data warehouse solutions, press 1.
To request a product demonstration, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Sales representative for your demo request.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a live demo of your cloud data warehouse solution.
I’d like to schedule a product demo to evaluate Snowflake’s secure data warehousing for my veteran outreach program.
Schedule a demo of Snowflake’s elastic data warehouse with a focus on real-time streaming ingestion.
I want someone to walk me through a live demo of Snowflake’s data warehouse.
Schedule a demo of Snowflake’s cloud warehouse to evaluate handling of large physics datasets

contents.text: For pricing and billing questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a Sales representative for pricing and billing assistance.

navigationGoals: I’d like to get a detailed pricing and billing breakdown for your platform.
I need to discuss pricing and billing options to budget Snowflake services for my nonprofit veterans’ organization.
Get clarification on Snowflake’s billing model, specifically compute versus storage cost breakdowns.
I have questions about my invoice and need help with pricing details.
Get detailed pricing and billing information for a student research subscription

contents.text: For Technical Support and assistance with your Snowflake account, press 2.
For account setup and onboarding assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our Onboarding team.

navigationGoals: I need help setting up a new Snowflake account and getting onboarded.
I need help with account setup and onboarding so I can start using Snowflake for our data migration.
Help me set up a new Snowflake account and configure single sign-on integration.
I need assistance getting my new Snowflake account set up.
Receive guidance on setting up my Snowflake account for a university project

contents.text: To report a service issue or ask technical questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.

navigationGoals: I’m having a technical issue with my Snowflake service and need immediate support.
I want to report a technical issue and get support for the query failures I’m encountering in my Snowflake account.
Troubleshoot a warehouse startup error and diagnose query performance failures.
I’m having technical problems with Snowflake and need support.
Report a data load error and troubleshoot query performance issues
